There are moments when the ordinary simply won’t do—when you long for something unexpected, something that lingers on the palate and in the memory. Enter escargot, that celebrated French delicacy, a little jewel of a dish, drenched in garlic, butter, and the kind of indulgence that whispers of far-off Parisian nights. After a recent sojourn in France, we at LUSH felt compelled to share this culinary treasure. Imagine, if you will, tender snails luxuriating in a butter infused with garlic, lemon, parsley, white wine, and just a hint of black pepper—a rich, comforting embrace that requires no passport, only a willingness to savor.

But perhaps snails are not your preference. No matter. For those who shy away from the thought of such creatures, we present the “escar-NO” option. Here, we substitute juicy chicken thighs, gently poached in that same sumptuous butter. The effect is nearly identical—a harmonious symphony of flavors, but with a more familiar, approachable centerpiece.

Whether you lean toward the adventurous or the traditional, your palate is in for a journey. Come to LUSH and let us whisk you away to the charm of a Parisian bistro, one buttery morsel at a time. We won’t pry into your choice; we’ll simply delight in your enjoyment. After all, fine dining, like fine living, is about the pleasure of the experience.
